verbose_text: Although the expression of non phosphorylated STAT3 did not differ between the KO and WT mice, significantly increased p-STAT3 expression was detected in the retina and RPE / choroid in the LysM-Cre +/- : SOCS3 fl/fl mice, suggesting a spontaneous activation of STAT3 in ocular myeloid cells (e.g., retinal microglia, choroidal macrophages and dendritic cells) in the KO mice.
